input: What are the side effects of aspirin?
expected_output: Common side effects include stomach upset and bleeding.
actual_output: Aspirin can cause stomach irritation and increase bleeding risk.
retrieval_context: Aspirin (acetylsalicylic acid) may cause gastrointestinal upset, bleeding, and allergic reactions.
Common NSAIDs like aspirin are associated with GI bleeding risk.

expected_output: Solar panels convert sunlight into electricity using photovoltaic cells.
actual_output: Solar energy works by converting sunlight into electrical energy through photovoltaic panels.
retrieval_context: Solar panels use photovoltaic (PV) cells to convert sunlight directly into electricity.
PV cells are made of semiconductor materials that absorb photons and release electrons.
